solution_line_template: Movie tickets cost for two people is ${ticket_cost_per_person} x {num_sisters} = $<<{ticket_cost_per_person}*{num_sisters}={total_ticket_cost}>>{total_ticket_cost}.
The sisters will receive change of ${money_brought} - ${total_ticket_cost} = $<<{money_brought}-{total_ticket_cost}={change_received}>>{change_received}.
